text: Yeah, I've been torn between 3 different directions to take the project - as a livecoding (algorave) visuals tool for myself, a collaborative editor, and a mobile IDE. After Programming Conf I think I'm going to focus primarily on the mobile aspect, with a bit of collaboration tools too. I do use it on a regular laptop about as much as on mobile, but my laptop has a touch screen and I have a wacom tablet.
